sentence: His pick of Hershel Walker and his feud with Brian Kemp will likely cost him Georgia again this year, at least.
title: Why Ann Coulter is 100% right about Trump being finished...

sentence: In Georgia, Trump is looking to settle a personal vendetta against Republican Governor Brian Kemp, who declined to work with Trump in his effort to overturn President Joe Biden's narrow victory in the state.
author: Jason Lemon
title: Trump-Backed Candidates Face Increased Attacks From GOP as Primaries Loom

sentence: Similar pushback to Trump-backed candidates has played out in Tennessee, where GOP lawmakers pushed through legislation in a bid to keep one of his endorsees off the ballot, as well as in Georgia, where Trump has a vendetta against incumbent Republican Governor Brian Kemp because he declined to help overturn President Joe Biden's 2020 election win in the southern state.
author: Jason Lemon
title: Ex-Trump Admin Official Knocks His 'Dumb Endorsements' in GOP Primaries

title: Republican governors sprint right, eyeing re-election and 2024
